about.title: About me
about.description: My name is Krzysztof, and I live in Pozna≈Ñ. As a front-end developer with over 4 years of experience, I specialize in creating modern web applications using the Angular framework. My projects combine aesthetics, functionality, and intuitiveness, always created with attention to the smallest details and semantics. As a perfectionist, I attach great importance to the quality of the code. I constantly strive to develop and improve my skills, which allows me to work effectively in teams and adapt to the changing requirements of projects, making my work better and better.
about.characteristics: Practicial, innovative, reliable, working with full commitment
about.cooperation: If you are interested in cooperation, please contact me!

skills.title: Skills
skills.info-title: Technologies and tools that I use on a daily basis
skills.info-description: As a skilled web developer, I specialize in using technologies such as HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and Angular to create dynamic and responsive web applications. In designing user interfaces, I apply Materials UI and Bootstrap, ensuring both efficiency and aesthetic appeal. Docker and REST API are crucial in my daily work, enabling effective and reliable communication with servers. Tools like Git and Jira are indispensable for project management and team collaboration, allowing for smooth organization and coordination.
